metadata.name: Fells ft Sound of Fractures
metadata.description:
This music NFT is a collaboration token 

It represents the right to a 1 time collaboration with Sound of Fractures using the musical elements contained within Fells. 

Fells is a sketch of an idea that I’ve wanted to develop for while but just haven’t found that right path for it to move forward yet. 

This token gives you access to the full stems for the holder to create with. 

Potential uses include:

Remix parts 
Sample pack  
Song collaboration

This piece is not CCO but instead allows the holder a flexible way to collaborate with Sound of Fractures. This may be represented in writing credits, a traditional co-write or as a Sound of Fractures feature.

You can use the stems to create new music, add too them or just use them as samples.

All release details to be confirmed with Sound of Fractures before minting or distribution.

Look forward to working with you

Jamie x
